channel.title: How do you make Vote/vote.php page on your website?
channel.description:
How do you make Vote/vote.php page on your website so that when you click ::vote you type in your username and bobs ur uncle :L i have code for ::vote just dont no what link to put in there as i dont no how to make the /vote page
any help will be much apreceated

item.title: How do you make Vote/vote.php page on your website?
item.dc:creator: @Nonamee Nonamee
item.description:
@Nonamee wrote:

I used this.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

For the link, I think you put the voting link that you vote on. Some sites have you do the human test stuff, I just redirect my players to one of the sites at that part where they type the words and click vote. Tbh, even I don’t understand what I’m saying. Just look at the guide.
